rules_text:
When this creature enters, each player may cache the top card of their library face-down. [i](They may exile the top card of their library face down, look at it, and create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
{3}{G}: This creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
